Everything happens for a reason. It’s easy to be grateful when things are smooth sailing but it gets more difficult when faced with life trials. Reflect on your experiences and you’ll realize how much you’ve learnt from them all. They’re part of the Almighty’s plan.

Remember, the Almighty is only a call away. Talk to Him about your dreams, your goals. Tell Him everything. Confide in Him rather than in people because He will never betray your trust. He will show you a way out of every difficulty if you’re patient & willing to learn.

Remember, you’re not at the mercy of other people. Why do you waste your time worrying about what others will do? They can’t stop what is meant for you; what the Almighty has decreed for you. Go forth happily knowing He’s got your back. Trust Him.

Start cleaning up your act in preparation for the blessed month. Get rid of anger, envy, hatred, malice, slander, gossip, obscene talk swear words and the likes from your mouth. Make a commitment to never let them back into your life. Seek the Almighty’s help. Be sincere.

You should know by now that not everyone wants to see you succeed. Many out there would rather see you fail, your dreams shattered and be in a state of distress. It’s sad but it’s the harsh reality. Be careful who you share your plans, goals, and dreams with.

Don't be foolish and start comparing yourself with others. It will rob you of your inner peace and you’ll find yourself heading down the slippery road of envy and jealousy. The truth is you’re unique. The Almighty created you to do things that no one else was created to do!

Be careful when you’ve hurt someone deliberately. If you’re guilty, apologise as soon as possible. Don’t hesitate. May the Almighty protect us from being the source of pain and tears in someone else's life! May He forgive our sins and shortcoming!

Being quiet and gentle doesn’t mean you’re weak. Such people show strength that’s under control. It’s knowing when to speak and when to listen; when to take action and when to wait. Don’t underestimate such people. They walk with the greatest strength!

You may think the road is long. You keep falling. You depend on Him & only Him to help you up again. This is part of life. The Almighty has promised it won’t be easy. He’s testing the level of your conviction & courage; that quiet voice in you that’s says, “I’ll keep trying”.

I can't believe they made me sing! I guess there is a first for everything. Or for some things at least. Not bad for a beginner... looooool. Blessings and Salutations upon the Prophet Muhammad pbuh.

#salawat #muftimenk #respectall #BuildingBridges #seerahconvention #doha #katara https://t.co/xPViXDpqTL

People worry about falling in love, finding real love & so on. They forget that the Almighty is the real source & owner of love. Attach your heart to Him & things will fall into place. When you attach it to what He has disallowed, be prepared to be heartbroken & miserable!

People will only show you what they want you to see. Remember, everyone has a chapter in their lives where they don’t read out loud. So don’t be fooled by the “perfect front” that people put up on social media. You’d be foolish to believe all that.

Think of positive things. Don’t think of who offended you, who betrayed you, who took you for granted & what didn’t work out. Such things are bound to happen in life. Instead, think of the goodness the Almighty has bestowed on you and how fortunate you are!

At times, what is not said is the more powerful message that you need to be more aware of. The one who says “I’m fine” but has eyes full of tears. The one who smiles because she’s too sad to cry. Remember, even the strongest  people have their breaking points. Be kind always!

Beware the tricks of Satan. He  causes people to procrastinate, become lazy and delay doing good deeds. He makes a sinner put off repenting, indulging in his desires, telling him that one day he could repent, but not now because he will sin again! Don’t fall for such tricks!

Almighty. On this blessed day, forgive us for those times when we were facing problems and we were so quick to become discouraged or depressed, forgetting how you’ve never let us down. No matter what comes our way, we will put our trust in You. We know You’ll see us through!

Not all battles are worth fighting. Simply walk away from those who disrespect you by lying. The best response to such people is no response at all. There’s no need  to divulge everything you know. Any confrontation usually leads to more lies. So leave it be. The Almighty knows!

Some people find it so hard to apologize when they’ve done wrong. It’s to do with their pride. You can never get them to say  sorry, no matter how obvious their mistake is. Beware such pride, even the size of a mustard seed will not let you smell Paradise.

There are too many people criticizing others, pushing them down, looking for their faults and dooming them. Be the positive force who tries to push them up, motivate them, see the best in them, offer words of encouragement and lift them up.

Nothing that happens in your life is random. Everything is planned by the Best of Planners. Every failure, every closed door, every stumbling block, every success, every disappointment has all helped make you into who you are today. Thank the Almighty for everything!

Remember, the more you talk about the negative things going on in your life, the more miserable you become and in fact you will worsen the situation. Commit yourself to talk of positive things and overlook the negative. Thank the Almighty for having brought you this far!

How someone looks on the outside doesn't determine their worth.  We need to look at what’s inside: their kindness, generosity & character.  Next time you hear others mocking the way someone looks, don't encourage it. Don't feel the need to add your own comments. Put a stop to it!

In life, not everyone will treat you the same way as you treated them. That’s the harsh reality. Those who disappoint you are not blind; they’re just too busy to see & appreciate what you’ve done for them. So don’t expect anything from others. Your reward is with the Almighty.

When you give others a sincere compliment, words of encouragement or just a warm smile, you are making their world a better place. You are making them feel appreciated and valuable. You will feel more fulfilled because you have done something to make someone else’s life better.

If they respect you, respect them. If they disrespect you, still respect them. If they’re mean to you, be kind to them. If they curse and swear in your presence, offer a good word to them. Don't allow their bad actions to affect your good manners. Rise above them.

Remember, there are many out there who act like they are experts in the lives of others. The ones trying to throw stones at other people are not perfect. In fact,  only those who have to hide bad things throw mud at others, to turn the attention away from themselves.

It's natural to feel frustrated when things are not going your way. But don’t let it get to you. Understand the Almighty’s plan when that happens. Look for the positive lesson you’re meant to be learning from it. Have a good attitude & you’ll end up happier.

When you pray for others, it shows your heart is pure. Especially when you pray for  people you don’t know. And they may never know. But your one prayer can make a world of difference for them. So keep praying and spreading goodness because you never know who’s praying for you.

Don't be sad just because someone did something bad to you, lied to you or betrayed your trust. Being upset will not change anything nor will it undo what has happened. Let it go. Keep a light heart and trust that the Almighty will take care of things.

You'll encounter many people who aren’t really what they seem. They have hidden agendas. They make themselves feel better by putting others down. They achieve a position of power or prestige at the expense of others. They love to control other people. Go far away from them!

You don’t have to win every argument. You don’t need to have the final say in everything. It’s your ego at work and you need to tame it. Make a decision to let go of the need to control, the need to be approved and the need to judge. Focus less on yourself!

When you’ve reached a stage in your life where you can remain calm when a calamity strikes, you have certainly matured spiritually. It shows you have complete faith in the Almighty and you know that nothing lasts. No matter what happens in life, it will pass eventually.

How can you lose hope when you know the Almighty is handling your affairs? He will handle your troubles, your stresses, your sickness and everything that afflicts you and make you whole again. For as long as you believe in Him and only Him to turn your troubles around.

Almighty. On this blessed day, we pray for the helpless, the hopeless and those who are hurting. Everywhere we look, there’s chaos in the world. Make their load easy and their burden light. Give them hope when they’re tempted to become discouraged or depressed.

Why is it we often find ourselves treating our loved ones so badly? Yet we treat outsiders well. We’re always conscious of portraying a good image. Take time to reflect on what life would be like without the ones you love. This should set you back on track. Show gratitude.

Remember, not everyone is like you. If you’re the type who keeps to time, doesn’t procrastinate, means everything you say and walks the talk, don’t expect others to behave in the same manner. You’re setting yourself up for a huge disappointment if you do.

Even when you don’t understand what’s going on in your life, you have to trust the Almighty. He’s taken you there for a purpose. Keep praying. Keep asking for guidance. If you’re sincere in getting answers, He will unravel His Plans before your eyes. Get ready to be amazed!

It takes a lot of courage to stand alone & be yourself. It takes a lot of courage to be different. It takes a lot of courage to not compromise your faith.  Some will try to make you feel like a freak for not standing with the crowd. That’s ok. Listen to your heart!

When you feel guilt in your heart after you’ve sinned, be grateful. It’s the Almighty’s way of telling you to repent and do good. He’s offering you a way out after you’ve gone against what He has prescribed. That’s His Mercy!

You may have been praying and asking the Almighty to get you out of a situation but know that He may not grant you a way out for a reason. Perhaps, there’s a lesson there He wants you to learn. But trust Him to give you the strength to overcome the hardship.

When the Almighty strategically places blessings in your path, acknowledge them and thank Him for what He has bestowed on you. They’re placed there for a reason. He’s watching how you use them to gain His Pleasure. Don’t lose the plot.

Why would you waste your time and energy worrying about something that hasn’t even happened? Worry is a natural emotion. It’s up to you to control it and stop it in its tracks before it spirals out of control. Get your focus back. Don’t let Satan mess with your mind.

You think you have it tougher than others. Stand your ground.Hold on to your faith, your integrity. Don’t let anyone sidetrack you. The Almighty never promised you an easy journey. Tough times will reveal your true character. Seek His help. Be strong. Don’t quit.

For a calm and more peaceful life, quit listening to gossip and learn to ignore what others are saying about you. Look for the good in everything. Learn to be positive and spread goodness. Always remember to be grateful for your life. And let the Almighty handle everything else!

Be careful who you seek advice from because not everyone who acts friendly is a friend. There are people out there who can mislead you, cause mischief and those who may not have the right intention. Ask the Almighty to place someone in your path whom you can trust.

The Almighty has worked it out for you. He has a specific purpose for your life and yours alone. You need to trust Him fully. Not half-heartedly. You will be tested and tried but if you bear patience, the end result will only bring you happiness.

Don't have sleepless nights over your enemies. The Almighty will take care of them and  give them their due for causing all the hurt and trouble. Have faith things will work out fine and that you’ll emerge better than you were before.

Pray even when you don’t feel like praying. Prayer changes things. What do you want to change? Difficult people, bad situations, low morale, weak faith. Open your heart and pray. Pray sincerely. The Almighty is ever ready to listen and answer your prayers.

We tend to complain too much. Our job is too difficult. Our parents are too demanding. Our children are too mischievous. Chronic complaining never makes anything better, it saps your energy & the energy of those around you. Look for the positives. You’ll be a much happier person.

Some people make your life so difficult. It’s as if they find joy in doing such things. When you feel you’ve done your best to get along with them but can’t, don’t fret. The Almighty won’t allow such people to break you. Trust Him and He will find a way out for you!

Almighty. On this blessed day, help us truly understand that things work by Your schedule. Not ours. We tend to forget that. We’re always in a rush. That’s what this world has taught us. Sadly, we forget that one of the biggest life lessons You’re teaching us is patience!

My Book, Motivational Moments by Mufti Menk is now available online for easy global shipping  from https://t.co/W3tfQ8DKbA based in Dubai and https://t.co/RTEc7xcV0y based in the UK.

I thank you all for the overwhelming response thus far. 😍😍😍 https://t.co/0GO7RMvBQk

Lighten your load in life. Learn to be compassionate. Pray for those who hurt you. Try it. You’ll  feel your anger being replaced by a sense of calm. The Almighty will be so pleased with you and you’ll feel the effects in many aspects of your life. It could be your Paradise!

The job problems, marital woes, parents and in-laws, financial issues - you can handle them all with patience and strength from the Almighty. You have to believe and trust that He wants the best for you. He’s your Creator.  Whatever’s happening, He knows without a doubt!

Life's challenges come in all shapes & sizes. Your journey is yours alone. It’s unique to you. Don’t expect anything from anyone. If you want something done well, do it yourself. Trust the Almighty who’s keeping watch over you. Wherever life takes you, it’s part of His Plan.

We've all had our fair share of “nos” and closed doors.  Don’t be discouraged.  It’s all temporary. Just like this life is temporary. When the time is right, the Almighty will open your doors which will lead you to all the “yeses”. Be patient. Have faith.

You can’t choose your family. The Almighty has done that for you. So learn to give and take and accept them for who they are. Flaws and all. It’s not easy. But know that breaking the ties of kinship is a huge sin. Remain respectful and keep the peace.

Does your heart feel burdened? Do you feel like your life is crumbling? Bad days happen to everyone. Start counting your blessings. Remember that there are so many who would trade places with you. For the life you have. For everything He has blessed you with. Be grateful.

If you're being tested with something that hurts or upsets you, be patient. Remember, the Almighty won’t make you endure more than you can bear. He has the power to change whatever you’re experiencing. It will happen... in His time!

Losing someone you love is a huge test of faith. That’s the reality of this life. How you pick yourself up and carry on shows how much you understand the Almighty’s plan. May He help us cope with our loss and reunite us with our loved ones in Paradise.

Don't take your sins lightly. You may think you’ve done nothing wrong but you forgot that one person you shouted at when you lost your temper;  the other person you pushed aside so you got ahead in the queue. May the Almighty help us to constantly reflect on our shortcomings.

When you supplicate to the Almighty, never think for a moment that He might get tired listening to you or angry or even fed up because you keep asking and asking. Remember, He’s our Creator. Nothing is impossible for Him. So keep asking!

In life, there’s so much we can’t control. That’s the main reason why we are anxious. So instead of worrying, learn to focus on the things that we can control and then put our trust in the Almighty to take care of all the rest. You will feel the weight lifted from your shoulders!

No matter how sad or how low you feel, don’t opt for a temporary high by going against what the Almighty has prescribed. It won’t last and you’ll end up feeling worse. It will rob you of your peace and gain His Wrath.

Don't be foolish and expose every blessing of your life to everyone and think that they’ll be happy for you. Some will, but many won’t. The evil eye is real. Learn to keep things private and not to share too much with those who could possibly harm you.

If you’re hurting, the Almighty will heal you. If you’re lost, only He can guide you. If you see darkness in your life, only He can be that beacon of light. If you’re contented, only He can give you more happiness & goodness. If you have Him in your life, you have everything!

If you’re struggling to get rid of a bad habit, wrong attitudes, bitterness, diseases of the heart like revenge & hatred, don’t fret. It doesn’t happen overnight. You need a conscious effort and lots of help from the Almighty. Keep working on it. Nothing happens without His Will.
That's the test... https://t.co/FlQbG4hIw3

Almighty. On this blessed day, grant ease to everyone going through trials. May they face this new day with hope in their hearts. May You lighten the heavy burden each one is shouldering right now. Help them to remember that this too shall pass & that nothing lasts!

The sad truth today is many lose  themselves in the crowd trying to fit in. Learn to hold your ground. Remain steadfast in your beliefs. It’s not easy. People will mock you & taunt you. They’ll make you feel uncomfortable. Get hold of yourself. The Almighty will lift you.

When everything seems to be against you and you start thinking that you’re a loser, think again.  Is there any limit to the Almighty’s power? Did He not bring you this far? Do you think He will abandon you? When you believe and trust Him, all things are possible.

If you want change, do something about it. Change requires action. People will talk about wanting change and yet do nothing that requires them to change. If you’re sincere about it, seek the Almighty’s help. He will pave the way for you.
The Almighty tests us with success. Many find it so easy to forget Him when success comes their way. But if you remember that your success comes from Him, you will pass the test with flying colours!

We live in a selfish world today. Every man for himself. But don’t be selfish with your prayer, Pray for your friends, your family, loved ones, as well as those you don't know. Remember, you may think it’s not much but your sincere prayer can change someone's situation!

If you don’t want to be let down, don’t wait for someone else’s praise. The truth is you don’t need it. You have the resounding support from the Lord of the Worlds. Work for His acceptance rather than other people’s applause.

Some won’t understand you. Some won’t support you. Some will leave you. Some won’t care if you’re down in the dumps. But no matter what others put you through, your Creator will always be there for you. He knows every moment of your struggle. He will compensate you greatly!

Good News: Benefit from the live sessions that are regularly uploaded on my YouTube Channel. Subscribe to the Mufti Menk Channel. Please retweet for maximum reach. Topics are suggested by you the viewer. This one is on "Divorce and Child Custody". https://t.co/iOJ14U8s8N

For as long you’re alive, keep hope alive. Hope in the Mercy of the Almighty. Hope that He wants what’s best for you & will give it to you at the right time. So whatever you’re facing - trials, stress, broken affairs, have hope that they’re all temporary. Better days are ahead.

The world will demand so much from you. But at the end of the day, never forget that you’re human. Just like everyone else. You’ll feel pain, you’ll get hurt, youll feel broken, you’ll break down. That’s part of the process called life. You’ll be okay in the end.

Your wealth, your children, your beauty, your power should never make you feel arrogant. Remember, like a bolt from the blue, the Almighty can reclaim whatever belongs to Him. Anytime. But if you want something that lasts, choose humility and kindness.

Don't forget to thank the Almighty for the problems He kept away from us.  We tend to forget that not all have roofs over their heads or three meals, clean water, a safe environment. There are those who live daily, in fear of being tortured, oppressed and killed. Pray for them.

We spend so much and invest even more in order to project the best image of ourselves to the world. Yet, on the inside, many are crumbling and falling apart. Isn’t it time to invest wisely and pay heed to what lies beneath?

The All-Knowing is fully aware what others do behind your back. He knows every person who has done you wrong, every injustice, every plot against you. Relax because you can’t control such events. The Almighty will rule in your favour. You only have to trust Him.

Some days are better than others. That’s how life is. Learn to look for the blessing in each day. There’s no need to curse at how things are going. Be strong, stay positive. You can’t do it all because you’re human but you can try your best.

When you let envy breed in your heart, it will surely affect your faith, providing a way in for Satan.  This will lead to ungratefulness, hatred, backbiting and discontent. It causes division within the community, and even worse, within the family. Take heed!

Why do we feel disconnected from the Almighty at times? Especially when we’re being tested and when seemingly “bad things” are happening to us. We tend to forget that in reality, we have direct access to Him at all times. He’s our lifeline. Never overlook that fact!

Wherever you came from, whatever you’ve done; all these don’t matter. They don’t have to limit where you’re headed. Remember at the end of the day, how you started is not the issue. What matters most is how you end. Finish strong!

Everything the Almighty puts us through is to allow us to grow and to elevate our status. Nothing in this life happens by chance. Once you open your heart to your Creator, you’ll see Him in every part of your life. So read the signs and you’ll find contentment.

We need to change our mindsets when we ask the Almighty for something. Why do we ask and yet think we probably won’t get it? Why are we so pessimistic? Ask Him with sincerity, optimism and full of faith. Do this and watch how things will change.

When you’re able to accept everything that happens to you as part of the Almighty’s plan, you’re on the road to something greater. Remember, one day, all the pieces of the puzzle will fit and you’ll be so pleased that you were patient right till the end!

No one knows what the future  holds but what we do know is the Almighty has a plan for us. So no matter how bad the past  has been, how many times we fell and picked ourselves up, all that matters is we’re trying to get close to Him. None of this will be wasted!

Life is tough. When you look around the world today, it’s easy to lose hope. But you mustn’t. Because the Lord of the Worlds is in full control. Count your blessings, make the most of life. Even if it means getting through day by day, never forgetting your link with your Maker.

The Almighty will always find a way for us if it’s meant for us. It doesn't matter how many obstacles we face, the mountains we have to climb or the rivers we have to cross. At the end of it all, we will be fine because He is our guiding light.

There will be days when you feel confused. You feel like there’s both light and darkness inside you. What matters most is the part that you choose to act on. Strive towards light and goodness always. Resist the temptation to do the opposite!

When you don’t understand the Almighty’s plan, you’re more likely to lose hope. You feel like you’re doing everything wrong & you’re unsure about what lies ahead. But don’t give up. Keep talking to Him. He’s All-Knowing. He will steer you in the right direction.

You're having it tough. You can’t seem to move forward because you’re always looking in the rear view mirror. Don’t keep going back to where you’ve been. Move ahead. Focus on where you’re going. It’s time to look at blessings the Almighty has placed in your path. Start today!

Satan is a genius mastermind. His goal is to make us lose our sense of shame, forget our link with our Creator, do as we please and ignore all respectable boundaries. His role is to lead us slowly but surely towards the forbidden tree. Don’t fall for it. Stay vigilant!

There is always someone out there who has it worse than you. Don’t forget that. The Almighty has blessed you with more than you could ever ask for. You didn’t even have to ask for it. Gratitude is the key. Be grateful and He will grant you more.

We all have faults. We’ve all been through failures. We all have our frustrations. But never let them consume you. The Almighty knows what you’re going through. He knows your fears. Hand over all these and more to Him. Lighten your load!

Why are we often worried about what people can or can’t do for us.? Stop depending on others if you don’t want disappointments. Seek the Almighty. He loves it when you ask Him. He’s the Owner of everything. He’s Lord of the Worlds. You only have to ask.

You can reboot your life many times over and start afresh but if the program doesn’t involve the Almighty, you’ll be back to square one in no time. Never leave Him out of your equation if you want success in this world and the next!

Learn to look at your own faults often. In fact, when you scrutinise yourself, you wouldn’t dare to look for faults in others. Even if you spent every minute of your waking hours seeking  His forgiveness, it wouldn’t be enough. But have hope because the Almighty is Merciful.

We’re too quick to judge and that’s a fact. We label the quiet ones as snobbish. Has it occurred to us that they could be hiding a deep pain & prefer not to talk about it? Be gentle with people just like we’d like them to be gentle with us. Don’t assume anything.

It's easy to get caught up in this life to the point where you forget your spirituality and why you’re here. Make it a habit to start your day and end your day remembering the Almighty. Everything else in between will fall into place. Try it

The closer you get to the Almighty, the more clearly you see yourself. You’re more critical of your weakness and your sins. You repent more. You seek His forgiveness more. You spend more time thinking about your link with Him and how to strengthen the bond.

Patience is not easy. It’s  not for the fainthearted. That’s why the rewards are so great. It can break you, wreck you, makes you want to scream and give up but you press on because you know that’s what the Almighty loves. He is always with the patient.

Many people get upset when their work is not acknowledged. Don’t be. The Almighty knows what you’ve done and how much effort and sacrifice went into it. Isn’t that the best acknowledgment one could ever wish for?

Do you at times, feel that your life is one big obstacle course?  It seems as soon as you cross over one obstacle, another one awaits you. Don’t give up. The Almighty has your back, no matter what you’re going through!

One of the biggest gifts you can give someone today is your time and attention. Learn to cut back on time spent on the phone and social media. Facebook. Twitter. Snapchat. Instagram. They can all wait. Focus your attention on your family and rekindle meaningful relationships!

One of the toughest tests is to be kind to those who’ve not been kind to you. Revenge is a waste of time. You get a temporary high. Then it’s over. So forgive, do good, show mercy, lift the one who pushed you down. Can you imagine what the Almighty will have in store for you?

Some people enjoy slandering others and ruining their chances of marriage. They do this out of jealousy and envy. You can't stop them. Let people judge you by your character.  Be upright. Be strong. Surely the Almighty is aware of the evil they’re spreading.

No one is doomed for as long as you feel remorse after you’ve sinned. As long as you’re seeking forgiveness, the Almighty will forgive you. Satan will tease and taunt you that you’re not worthy of being forgiven. Ignore such thoughts. Never doubt His Mercy.

What ever it is that you want may be taking a lot longer than you had expected. But that’s okay. Don’t fret and don’t give up. The Almighty has a way of doing things and it’s not our way. Trust His timing.

Just because you fall or commit a sin, doesn’t mean you’re evil. It shows you’re human. But how you fix yourself thereafter is what matters most. Get back up and turn to the Almighty as soon as you can. With each fall, repent and never give up.

Don't stress too much over those who try to cheat or hurt you. Remember, whatever goes around comes around. No evil doer will get away scot-free and any good will always be rewarded. Have faith in Almighty and get on with your life.

Don't give up just because you’re facing a temporary setback. The Almighty never promised a smooth journey. He never promised a life free of tests. But He promised that with hardship, there’ll be ease & nothing in this life lasts forever. So bear patience for a little while more.

Staying on the path is never easy. There’ll be brickbats, there’ll be distractions. There are many spiteful people around just waiting to throw you off course. Don’t allow that to happen. Tell the Almighty your anxiety. Ask Him to protect you.
No act of kindness that you do, no matter how small will go unnoticed. The Almighty is All-Knowing and sees what you do in private and He has promised to reward you openly for your faithfulness.

Don't be distracted and start comparing yourself to others. Comparison is a distraction. It sidetracks you from your original course. Instead of comparing yourself to others, recognize that the Almighty has bestowed on each of us just what we need for our individual journey!

You can't win a race if you keep looking back at the starting line, you have to look at the finish line. Don't worry about the failures & what you did in the past. Look to the future with great hope. Remember, the Almighty always wants the best for us.

Almighty. On this blessed day, we thank You for giving us the strength when we felt like giving up. We’ve learnt not to panic  because we know You’re with us. Keep our hearts firm in faith, come what may. We trust in the plans You have for us... for a bright future. Aameen.

The minute Satan sees you getting closer to the Almighty, he will distract you. He will do his utmost to block your spiritual growth. He will eat into your discipline and consistency. Understand his evil plan. Stay firm in faith and seek help from the Almighty.

You want inner peace? Don’t worry about what  others may think of you or whatever people may say. Lower your expectation of others. Don’t be distracted by the petty talk people may throw at you. Focus on what you want to achieve and keep going.

No matter what’s going on, always uphold decent character and conduct. Let them criticise, let them pick on petty issues, let them say nasty things. Be good and kind-hearted even if they aren’t. Do they think they’ll get away with it? Remember there’s Judgement Day!

Don't give up. Don’t quit. Hang in there. The Almighty loves you. He knows you’re trying hard. He knows the sacrifices you’re making. Don’t be afraid of what’s to come. He wants you to have firm faith in Him. Difficult journeys lead to beautiful destinations ultimately!

Are you the person who still manages to smile amidst chaos in your daily life? When your heart is full of pain and your eyes brimmed with tears but you soldier on because you know how much the Almighty loves patience; you know that the reward is beyond anything you can imagine!

Don't complain about who wronged you and who treated you unfairly. It’s all part of the Almighty’s plan to teach you life lessons; that’s why He allowed it. Once you’ve learnt them, you’ll be ready for new opportunities. He will open new doors for you.

When you’ve achieved something good, be prepared for the haters to come out in full force. They might ridicule you, spread rumours about you or even spew harsh words. Don’t worry. Focus on what’s right & keep going. The Almighty is on your side.

Have you ever been in desperate situations, where even your loved ones and family members are not able to comfort you? No one to hear you out. Perhaps it’s the Almighty’s way of reminding us to seek comfort and solace in Him.

Don't let your grief consume you to such an extent that you forget who’s in control. Try to step away from your broken state, even if just for a moment. You’ll see things clearer and realise that you own nothing. Nothing at all. Everything is on loan from the Almighty.

Nobody gets everything they want in this world. The nature of this world is such that things won’t go according to your plans. It’s all up to the Almighty. So when your faith is being put to the test, don’t crumble. Supplicate to Him. That’s the only way to change things.

Remember that everyone is being tested. You’re not the only one. Be patient with others because they’re also facing their own trials. Try to be considerate when dealing with people. Whatever you’re experiencing, the Almighty will surely resolve it in His own time.

You're stronger than you think. Every battle you’ve fought, every scar and wound, every stumble and fall - they’ve all made you into who you are today. So take on everything that comes your way calmly, with quiet confidence. The Almighty won’t give you more than you can bear.

Sad things will happen in your life. Try not to be upset, learn to accept things and take it in your stride. It’s all part of the Almighty’s plan. So choose to be accepting and face everything with full confidence, knowing that He’s watching over you. Always.

When someone hurts you, don’t keep the resentment in your heart. Forgive them. Don’t let the resentment control you. It can make you miserable & stuck in your past. You'll end up being controlled by the past. Let it all go. Move on.

Do you ever feel like you’ve wasted time with some people who never appreciated what you did for them? Don’t worry. You may have given more than you should but with the Almighty, nothing is ever wasted. He will reward you for all that you’ve done.

We want to get close to the Almighty. But we’re hardly aware with what we’re doing. Sadly, awareness isn’t always present in a rush-rush life. We move so fast. We can’t or don’t stop to think about what we’re doing or why we’re doing it. Slow down. Make Him a part of your life.

Never forget how far you’ve come. It’s easy to get carried away when times are good. There was a day when you didn't know how you could possibly go on. But you did. Always give thanks to the One who made it all possible. Stay humble.

Almighty. On this blessed day, we ask You to restore the broken parts of us and change them into something great. Guide us in all ways and let us not be complacent with all that You have bestowed on us. Make us humble, knowing that You can change anything.. anytime.

Every stage of life you’re in, is preparing you for the next level. Be thankful with what is and what’s to come. The Almighty has planned it all. So even if you seem to be in a hopeless situation and feel vulnerable, remember it will come to pass and be okay in the end.

Even the people closest to you may say mean and nasty things. Take it in your stride. That’s just how life is. Your job is to be patient and rise above it all. Never forget that the Almighty hears everything. Surely He will make things right!

Ever had one of those days when you feel completely lost and things just don’t seem to make sense? Things appear unfair and nothing is going according to your plan. Well, keep your heart firm in faith, knowing that the Almighty will indeed reveal His plans soon.

When you’re angry, try not to say anything. Remain silent. It’s very difficult and requires discipline. This will stop you from uttering mean words out of anger. Your anger will pass. But your mean words can scar someone for life. So use kind words or be silent.

Wasting time is worse than wasting money. Some will have more money than others. But we all have twenty four hours in a day. No one can buy more time on earth. Remember, a wasted dollar comes back, it can be earned. But a wasted minute is gone for good. Use your time wisely.

"Respect people of all faiths".
A reminder for children at a Muslim School. 
https://t.co/SD6Lm6vzer

It's easy to become distracted by this world and all that comes with it.  Don’t fall into this trap because before you know it, you’ll be sucked into this worldly web. Set your priorities. Keep your focus on the Almighty first. Everything else will fall into place.

Always be thankful for all the struggles that come your way. Every struggle you had in your life shaped you into the person you are today. So don’t curse the hard times for they can only make you stronger and let you emerge the winner!

When you have the right intent, the Almighty will facilitate things for you. Even the most difficult of tasks becomes a lot easier. So do things solely for the sake of the Almighty. Purify your intent and keep Him in focus.

Never forget that if the Almighty wills, He can take you at any time, any place. You could be in the pink of health but if He says you must go, you’ll have to leave this world. So live in a state of preparedness and always be grateful for another day!

This world is such that there’ll be people who love you and people who hate you. Remember, you’re not for everyone and that’s ok. So don’t waste your time with those who won’t give you time of day. Share your journey with those who value you.

You may be among the most beautiful, but if your tongue is ugly, your beauty will never be enhanced.  Protect yourself against arrogant speech and looking down on others. The Almighty has blessed us all differently.

So your life’s a mess. You can’t find a way out. You’ve never felt so alone. In the blink of an eye, the Almighty can show you a way out. You only have to turn to Him. He’s capable of giving you what you want and more. He will heal you. He will protect you.

Almighty. May we seek solutions and a way out from You instead of turning to others in times of hardship, pain and loss. Let us not search for temporary comforts in people and worldly things. Make us among those who seek help through patience and prayer.

Treat people with respect and always be kind. When we do that, we give them the space to grow and change. Don’t give up on others, especially family members and loved ones. Remember, the Almighty didn’t give up on you!

Don't look back! Control yourself when you feel the urge to do that. When you look back, you’re actually bringing the  past into the present. Let it all go and push on. It’s your test. Persevere. You’ll get there. That’s the only way forward.

Almighty. On this blessed day, we pray for the sick, the injured, the broken and the hopeless. We ask You to restore their well-being, soothe their pain, ease their burden of life and their worry. Aameen.

When you hold on to hate, you allow people from your past to continue to hurt you. That’s not a wise move. People in your past should stay in the past. They can’t continue to hurt you unless you hold on to the hurt. Let go and let the Almighty take over. He will deal with them.

Be careful when posting and sharing unverified news on social media. Unknowingly, you may be responsible for causing unnecessary problems and grief in different communities, fanning the flames of social unrest. Always verify your sources and act responsibly.

Many people are so busy spreading slander they hear about others that they do not even stop to consider whether it is true or false. Remember, if you hear something false about someone, defend him. The Almighty will defend you in this world and the next.

You can't force others to do what’s right. You can pray for them; motivate them, try and encourage them but you can’t go beyond that. If you know you’ve done your best, leave the rest to the Almighty. Don’t let them upset your sense of peace.

Don't slow down because the road is long. Don’t be discouraged because there’s hard work to be done. It’s your journey but you’re not alone. The Almighty is watching over you. Should you trip and fall, shake off the dust and carry on. His reward will be worth it in the end.

We all face challenges in life. At times, we have hurricanes and storms. We need to ride it out. It’s part of our test. Keep both feet on the ground. The Almighty always has our backs. We’ll be okay in the end.

Always have hope in His Mercy. Even when you think you don’t deserve it. The Almighty is there to forgive. And forgive. Remember, He loves those who turn to Him. Every single one of them. So what’s holding you back?

Don't try and fit in your five daily appointments with the Almighty only when you have the time. Chances are you’ll be busy and you’ll forget. Set aside time for Him daily. It’s an appointment you have to keep, no matter what’s going on in your life. Don’t break it!

Don't make fun of others. The one you’re making fun of could be a much better person than you. You’ll never know. Besides, making fun of someone stems from a heart that is full of bad character. Protect yourself from such acts.

You've worked on it day & night but didn’t achieve the results you had expected. Sometimes things don't work out because that isn't where the Almighty wants you to be. Trust Him. Trust His timing. Trust His plan. He’s the Best Planner. Trust that He always wants the best for you!

Coping with difficult parents isn’t easy. Accept the fact that your parents did the best they could. Remember, they’re also human, flawed & weak just like everyone. You need to accept them for who they are. You can’t change them. The only person you can change is yourself.

Pushing forward isn't always easy. But if things were easy all the time, we wouldn't need anything or anyone! Challenges draw us closer to the Almighty. Be grateful He’s testing us. That’s part of His Plan.

Beware the backstabber who pretends to be your best friend, only to turn around and betray you, spreading lies, untruths and hurtful gossip. Whatever the reason behind this behavior, it's important to protect yourself from it. Stay away from such people.

Beware the hypocrite who always finds faults or advises you about your life, job, habits, etc. But they never follow their own advice. Some have an agenda and can hurt your self-confidence badly. Don’t give your time to deceitful people pretending to be what they’re not.

No matter how impossible a situation might be, don’t let it overwhelm you. Remember, the Almighty has given you strength for that battle. He said you would never face something that you couldn’t handle!

There will be moments in your life when you have absolutely no one to turn to. No matter where you go and whatever you do, you won’t find anyone. Seek comfort from the One who made you because He will never leave you in the lurch. He is the Almighty.

We all go through struggles in life. Obstacles keep us on our toes & encourage us to change. Just because times seem tough now, does not mean they will remain this way for long. Just keep your eyes toward the sun, and you’ll eventually find that the shadows disappear behind you.

If you knew what the Almighty is doing for you behind the scenes and the blessings He has in store for you, you would certainly understand why you’re facing the trials and fighting such battles each day. Keep your focus!
Look at what young #Menk has been up to. He definitely deserves a retweet, like or share! I watched it unfolding. #NYC made in #Zimbabwe. Proud of you! https://t.co/83Uinp8DwM

Don't be sad and think that nobody could possibly be in a worse situation than what we’re facing now. That’s not true. Always look at those who are in far worse situations than ourselves when we’re feeling hopeless and depressed.

There will be people who will try to push you down and make you look bad. If you’ve done nothing wrong and have a clear conscience, don’t worry about it. The Almighty will lift you and make sure you emerge on top of it all.

Don't look down on anyone. Remember, we all sin. Yes, we all do, without exception. And we’re all in need of the same forgiveness from the same Creator, who is most Merciful. May the Almighty forgive us all. Aameen.

The more successful you are, the more likely people will plot and plan against you. Do your best to protect yourself against them but remember, there’s no power higher than the Almighty. If you have His protection, no one can harm you. Trust only Him!

Never feel like you have to go it alone. The Almighty is always there in both good and bad times. You’ll never have to face anything on your own as long as you call out to Him. He’s there waiting for you to turn back to Him. Do it today!

It's natural to focus on the problems and the pain when you feel that your world is falling apart. But know that the Almighty has a solution to everything and it’s only a matter of time before He sets it right. Have faith.

Get rid of arrogance from your heart. Don’t ever feel the need to look down on someone; not for anything that the Almighty has given you - your wealth, power, good looks etc. Remember His Might and Power and how He can take away your blessings in seconds!

Let people say what they want about you because sooner or later your actions will speak for themselves. So, there is no need to overreact when someone puts you down. You can make sure that you don't let them upset you by simply sticking to what you do best.

It's wrong to say things which hurt others. People say hurtful things for many different reasons. Some may feel powerful when they say words that hurt you. Some may be relieving their own internal pain by saying hurtful things. Whichever the case, it’s wrong. Stay away from it.

There's too much jealousy going around. So do what you must without having to shout out to the world. Work in silence. There’s no need to tell the world your next move. The truth is the Almighty is the only One who deserves to know everything.

The sad truth is some people can hate you for no apparent reason. They can dislike you without a cause. These are tests that the Almighty wants us to go through. Remember, people don’t control your destiny. He does!

Almighty. We ask You to hear the prayers and words we don’t utter but keep in our hearts. Help us to overcome the hardships in our lives. We know You will. You always do what is in our best interest. We trust You.

Don't say you have nothing to give someone in need. The greatest gifts have nothing to do with material things. The love you give, the hope you inspire, the time and helping hand you extend, the smile on your face .. these are worth so much more.
There's no need to be discouraged by trouble and difficulty. Remember, it will not defeat you unless you allow it to. In fact, hardship and trials toughen you and prepare you for life’s challenges.

Almighty. On this blessed day, give us the strength and courage to stay firm and hold on to our belief. Don’t make us among those who lose ourselves in a crowd just because we want to fit in. Make us worry less about what people think of us. Only You matter in the end!

Each time you’re tempted to give up, think of how far you’ve come. Everything you’ve been through; the times you thought you couldn’t make it but did; the mornings you couldn’t get out of bed but pushed yourself anyway. Always seek your strength from the Almighty. You’ll be ok!

Where you are today isn’t where you will stay. Nothing lasts. The Almighty has promised us. Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise with each new day. Keep hope alive in your heart. He's right with you!

The Almighty knows you’re trying. He will keep testing you to see if you’re sincere; if you’re striving your utmost and bearing patience. Honestly, that’s all that matters. That He knows you tried your best!

The Almighty doesn’t waste anything. Everything we go through is part of our life’s journey. The tests, the trials, the difficulties, the delays, the unfair situations; they all serve their purpose eventually. Trust in His Plans.

Don't belittle the gifts the Almighty has bestowed on you by comparing your life to others. Looking at other people’s accounts on social media, their wealth, their holidays, their lifestyle can create discontentment, even envy in you. Don’t go that route. Be grateful!
May the Almighty grant ease to the children of #Ghouta. Alleviate their suffering and keep them safe from the massacre going on in the area. Aameen. #SaveGhouta

Never think that all the prayers you’ve been making are wasted. Nothing ever goes to waste with the Almighty. He’s got everything under control. The dreams you’ve been wanting so badly will come when He decides you’re ready for it!

When you’ve wronged someone, don’t try to turn the tables and make yourself the wronged party. You may think you’re getting away with it but the Almighty knows. In fact, you should be afraid because when it all comes back  to you, the truth will out. He knows best!

It's common to blame others when things are not going your way. Looking for a scapegoat is easy. Blaming keeps people from having to look at what they did to get into the mess. But it takes a real man to admit fault and show remorse. Only then are you able to grow!
Look at what young #Menk has been up to. He definitely deserves a retweet, like or share! I watched it unfolding. #NYC made in #Zimbabwe. Proud of you! https://t.co/VGstguTTry

The truth is each night we go to bed not knowing whether we’ll be alive the next day. Yet, we carry on making plans and doing things as we normally do. It’s the hope in our hearts that keeps us going! Always thank the Almighty for another day to right the wrongs of yesterday.

It's common for us to become frustrated with a given trial or  situation and we complain and vent about it to everyone. But take a step back and think. The truth is we never know what goodness the Almighty has in store for us from the trial.

Don't take for granted the favours of our Creator. No matter how much water there is around you, be mindful of those who are facing severe shortage of this precious resource from the Almighty.  Don’t waste water. #SaveWater #EveryDropCounts

Imagine if the Almighty bestowed your blessings all at once! It would be a waste. You wouldn’t be able to enjoy it to the fullest. There’s wisdom in waiting; in bearing patience. So keep your faith and wait for the right time.

At some stage in your life, you’ve felt that life’s unfair. When you feel that way, you have to remind yourself that the Almighty is always in control, no matter what’s going on. Refuse to worry.  Thank Him, knowing that He will always fight your battles.

While my Twitter following has crossed the 3 million mark, I must acknowledge that those of you who retweet, like or comment have played big role in maximising the benefit and achieving this level. May the Almighty reward one and all. Aameen

The Almighty will never stop loving you, will never give up on you, will always have your back, will keep reminding you to turn back to Him, will pick you up each time you fall. So when the Most Merciful is there for you, who can be against you?

All shades of colours are beautiful. Remember, the Almighty doesn’t tolerate arrogance and racism. It’s a sin. He is only concerned with the state of your heart and your level of piety. Keep your focus on the right things.

Almighty. On this blessed day, we pray for those who are suffering & broken. Those who are trying to shake off their past mistakes & have a better life. Those who cry alone at night while the world sleeps. Grant them peace and healing. Aameen.
Do remember that not everything about you is meant to be disclosed to everyone. Keep private things private. Be discerning. It will keep you from a ton of trouble and disappointment in the end.
My recent visit to the @IslamicMuseum in Melbourne Australia was enlightening. https://t.co/xBJvYutaLo

One of the biggest flaws in humans is pretending to be blind to their own shortcomings but they’re the first to jump down someone's throat when others make a mistake. Learn to be more self critical instead of always pointing fingers.

Do you have a true friend? Someone who doesn’t care about your status or wealth; what car you drive, the kind of house you live in; who you socialise with, the one who will always defend you in your absence. If you do, you’re blessed. Hang on tight to that friend!

Backbiting often results from a weakness in the backbiter’s own soul, such as an inferiority complex. You should pry into your soul to discover what weakness prompted you to backbite another person. Only then can you set out to remedy that weakness!

Don’t waste your valuable time with people who have nothing but negativity in them. They criticise everything and everyone in the most damaging of ways. Choose to stay away from such toxic people at all costs. Do it for your well-being.

Life is never smooth sailing. We all get knocked down at some stage. The biggest test is how quickly we get back up. We must never stay down for long. Seek the Almighty’s help and you’ll stand up again and start moving forward.

The truth is most people are afraid of being judged, of being not good enough, of not being liked. So they protect themselves by acting tough or being sarcastic, or making jokes or just being fake. Work hard to be your honest self and you’ll attract the right people.

You're depressed and everything may look bleak now. You’re wondering if things will ever get better. Yes they will. The Almighty has promised us that after hardship, there’ll be ease. Don’t despair. There is hope yet!

Think of death often. The Angel of Death can visit us at any moment. Remember, death doesn’t discriminate between the young or old. Seek the Almighty’s forgiveness. May He make us among the people of Paradise.

Don't keep replaying the bad that’s happened over and over again in your mind. Don’t over think. Let it all go. We’re humans and we’re prone to making mistakes. Repent. Seek sincere forgiveness and move on. That’s what the Almighty wants from us.

It's human nature to take things for granted. Don’t put things off till tomorrow. Be disciplined enough to do it today. Things might be different tomorrow. The ones you love may no longer be there. Nothing is guaranteed. That’s a reality. What if tomorrow never comes?

The past is over and done with. You can’t rewrite it but you can certainly reset your future. Make a conscious effort to let go of yesterday and move forward with quiet confidence to the goodness that the Almighty has planned.

Don’t be fooled by Satan. He will make you think something is a failure and nothing good will come out of it.  Remember, the Lord of the Worlds has a way of making miracles out of mistakes. He will make you emerge from it even stronger than before.

Our journey is paved with sadness & periods of happiness as well. No matter what the Almighty places in our path, keep putting one foot in front of the other, even when it hurts. Remember, no one knows what lies ahead but the One who made us. It will always be what’s good for us.

As much as you must remember to thank the Almighty for everything He’s bestowed on you, don’t forget to thank Him for what didn’t happen as well. Thank Him for the doors He has closed and the problems He has stopped that you knew nothing about.

Thank the Almighty, no matter what the circumstances. It’s not just to do with wealth & good things. Thank Him for guiding you & keeping you steadfast. Thank Him for increase in knowledge, for the lessons you’ve learnt form hardship. Do this each day and He will give you more.

Know that you will never understand everything that’s going on in your life. Why things happen the way they do. If you try to figure it all out, you’ll end up getting frustrated. Leave it to the All-Knowing Almighty. Trust Him!

Almighty. On this day, help us to often think of the day when we’ll be returning to You. Take us only when You are totally pleased with us. Make us understand that each day of this life gives us a chance to further prepare whatever we need for that long-awaited meeting with You.

Today, it has become difficult to distinguish truth from falsehood. Society has become so fake that the truth actually bothers some people. Be cautious of what you hear and spread to others. Check and double check your news and their sources before you hit that send button!

The scars you get in life are proof of your inner strength. It shows you've lived your life fully; how you picked yourself up when you fell, how you handled defeat, darkness and storms. These are among the Almighty’s biggest tests and what truly matters in the end!

Don't be fooled by the glitz and glamour you see around you. Everyone has problems. Every single one, without exception. It’s just that some prefer to talk about it, while others choose to hide it; away from the prying eyes of the public.

Take time to examine the state of your heart often. If the Angel of Death came today, would you be prepared? Are you happy with your life thus far? Are you happy with the way you’ve spent your time? Are you happy with what you’ll be presenting to the One who made you?

When things get too complicated and you don’t understand what’s going on in your life right now, keep a heart full of trust and keep moving forward. Don’t listen to the naysayers. In time, things will get clearer

If you think it’s one hardship after another and you feel like  caving in, think again. The Almighty knows you can handle it. He knows you’re strong. He wants you to remember that difficult battles are ONLY given to strong soldiers!

The truth is the online space is getting ftom bad to worse. People think and type away behind walls of fake names and identity; they think they can get away with it because nobody knows. The truth is the Almighty knows. Remember, you’ll be held accountable for all your actions.

Strive to develop a relationship with the One we’re praying to. The trouble with most of us, we just want our prayers answered and don’t give much thought to the One we’re asking from. We love His gift but we ignore the Giver. Learn to be grateful and He will give you more!

Whatever doesn’t feel right, don’t do it. Remove it from your life. Don’t listen to the whispering of Satan. He wants you to feel despair. The Almighty doesn’t. He only wants what’s best for you. Always seek His help sincerely. He will guide you.

Treasure the gift of time. Once it’s gone, you won’t see it again.  And there’ll come a day when your time in this world will be over. Don’t regret your life while letting the minutes slip by.  Live the best way you can in the Almighty’s  obedience!

Everyone, including good people will do bad things. That’s the nature of humans. We all have flaws. We all commit sins. Nobody is perfect. But learn from your mistakes and try to become a better person with each passing day. It’s never too late to change.

Occasionally, someone opens up to you like never before; showing you their heart & all that comes with it. The hurt, the wounds & scars. Honour the fact that they confided in you. It takes a huge amount of courage & trust to do that! Don’t betray them!

When you reach the level of trust in the Almighty, without any reservation, you don’t stress over life. You let Him do what He wills. If He opens a  door for you, thank Him; if it doesn’t open, you still thank Him. That’s the beauty of complete trust!

In this day and age, many young people hang on to the belief that  if it feels good, do it. This simply means you’re allowing yourself to be controlled by your moods, living life according to your feelings. This can be dangerous.  Learn to live a life of faith!

Be wary not to oppress anyone. The Almighty is All-Knowing and He will ensure one way or another that the one who oppresses will be the one who comes back (even years) later, needing something from the one he oppressed. That’s life!

We tend to worry because we wonder if we will have what we need, when we need it. But remember that if we expect other people to meet our needs instead of the Almighty, we will end up frustrated and disappointed.  He is the only One who can meet all our needs!

When you put the Almighty at the top of your priority list, watch the doors He'll open for you. He knows what’s in your heart so do it sincerely. Don’t pay lip service with your Creator. Do your best, leave the rest to Him and watch your life unfold.

When you feel you’ve hit rock bottom and can’t take it anymore, understand that the Almighty wants you to know that everyone may have abandoned you, but the One who made you will always be there for you. Seek Him.

No matter how long the delays, how many closed doors you’ve experienced, keep things in perspective. Embrace the lessons. They’re all good in the end. The Almighty allowed them into your life. Be grateful.

Almighty. On this blessed day, protect us from being leaking buckets; those who follow up their good deeds with bad ones. May we not be among those who pray daily but curse & swear others, or those who derive pleasure when others fail. Keep us mindful of such behaviour.

Don't think you’ve made it in life because of your power, position and authority. None of it will last. Nothing in this life will last. So always remain humble and attach your heart to that which matters. Keep the Almighty close and you’ll emerge the winner!
Hijab is a right today, tomorrow and everyday. The right to cover. #WorldHijabDay #StrongInHijab

Thank the Almighty for everything. Yes, everything. You thank Him not only for all the blessings He has bestowed on you but for the trials, the difficulties and the frustrations that have come your way. They have surely helped you become a better person.

Be careful when you blurt out harsh words in harsh tones. The hurt might pierce deeper than you could ever imagine. You probably think a simple sorry can fix it. But think again. Words can leave scars. Some scars are more permanent than others.

The Almighty is the most Merciful. Even when our faith is weak or lacking, He continues to bless us. He continues to favour us, despite the odds. He will keep doing that for as long as He wishes. That’s the Almighty.

Don't go round pretending to be who you’re not. Many people go through life wearing different masks. Remember you can fool others but the Almighty knows the real you. The fake will eventually lose and the real will win over.

When you start your day by making time for the Almighty and spending time with Him, you’ve nothing to fear. Rest assured that He will guide your steps in the path of blessing and victory throughout your day.

You want a better life? Pray. The more you pray, the less you will panic. You’ll see things clearer. The more you worship the Almighty, the less you will worry. You will become a more patient person and you’ll be less pressured by the stress of this world.
Almighty. Give us the courage to move forward, the strength to go through our hardships and trials and to have firm faith in You that everything will turn out fine in the end. Aameen.

There is way too much competition in our world today. Few people want to work together and help each other succeed. Instead, we get envious when others do well. This is wrong. It should motivate and make us want to succeed as well.

Don't hate on people, no matter how much they’ve wronged you. Give generously, no matter how little you have. Forgive those who have hurt you, no matter how hard it is and see how much easier your life becomes.

If you want to feel the beauty of worship, cleanse your heart. Get rid of pride, hatred and anything that gets in the way of being fully focused on the Almighty. It won’t happen overnight but you’ll get there.

You need to understand this. Just as the Almighty opens doors nobody can shut for you, He also shuts doors that nobody can open. So at times, no matter how hard you try or how badly you want something, it just won’t happen.

Whatever the Almighty has decreed for you, no one can stop. If you’re doing your best to stay on His Path, whatever’s meant for you will be yours.  There is no  need to chase after it. It will come to you.

Trust people by all means but don’t go overboard. Remember, there’s no guarantee in life; even the closest people around you may go against you. But as long as you trust the Almighty, He will never let you down. Have patience and you’ll reap the reward.

Almighty. On this blessed day, help us to understand that life doesn't always go the way we want. You’re the only One who knows what’s best for us. You’re the only One who knows what the future holds. Help us to remain steadfast & face every test with utmost patience.

I am always impressed by those who display great character despite their achievements. It makes them even greater. The international cricketer Yusuf Pathan at the Vadodara Airport recently during my transit in India. @iamyusufpathan https://t.co/VsgPIV2VKR

Your faith, like most things in life will fluctuate. Don’t expect it to remain constant. There’ll be ups and downs, highs and lows. Don’t let that define you. Do things sincerely for the sake of the Almighty and your faith will strengthen by His Mercy.

Why worry about what people think of you? It really doesn’t matter. Just stay away from grudges and revenge. Work towards keeping a heart full of love instead. It’s not easy but it can be done. Seek your strength form the Almighty and keep your intent pure.

When you’re able to control your tongue, it shows you have matured spiritually. Misuse of the tongue can lead to destruction, sometimes without even realizing it. Learn to let go of unwholesome chats and let only beneficial things come out of your mouth.

You could be experiencing chaos and difficult times in your life but if you seek the Almighty amidst all that uncertainty, you’ll find a sense of peace in your heart because you know nothing is permanent. You know ease is around the corner. Be patient.

Instead of making everything about yourself, learn to be an active listener and allow others to speak for a change. Show you’re interested, lend an ear to hear about their troubles without making any judgement. You’ll be surprised how much you can help someone just by listening.

It's a misconception to think that you cannot start praying and getting close to the Almighty unless you have turned your life around fully. Understand that this is a trick of Satan. Don’t fall for it. No matter what’s going on in your life, pray! Keep praying!
The problem with us is we think our problems will never get better. We lack faith. We lack trust in the Almighty. Has it occurred to us that He already had the solution way before we had the problem?

Remember, the Almighty never tests you with anything except to help you reach a destination that you ultimately wish to reach, deep down in your hearts. So bear patience and you’ll emerge the winner in all this.

We tend to assume people will always be there for us and we can appreciate them later. What if that later never comes? Don’t take things for granted. Share your feelings, especially with loved ones and those close to you before it’s too late.

Our life is never a straight road. There’ll be detours. There’ll be road blocks; but remember, it’s a journey of faith. Trust the Almighty fully in all conditions. It’s part of our test. Understand His Plan.

Don't fall into the trap of Satan who makes you believe that happiness comes with getting all that your heart desires. This is simply not true. Happiness is enjoying all that you have been blessed with.

What you do away from the public eye speaks a lot about you. In fact, it shows your true character. And don’t think no one knows or sees it because the Almighty knows everything about you, both done publicly and in private.

At times, the Almighty gives us so many warning signs yet we totally ignore them, often thinking we know better. Understand His Plan. He is trying to protect us from harm and whatever evil that stands in the way.

Stop stressing yourself over how your life is going to turn out. Nobody has it all figured out. No one knows. Only the One who made you knows what will happen. So live your life the best way you can and attach your heart to the One who matters most.

Never doubt what the Almighty can do. The Lord of the Worlds knows how to suddenly change things. He can suddenly move people out of your life. He can suddenly open doors you never dreamed would open. He is the Best Planner!

Whatever you do, don’t fall into this trap. Don’t try to paint an awful picture of someone else in order to paint a perfect picture of yourself. It will come back to haunt you and it won’t be a beautiful sight. Take heed.

The closer you get to the Almighty, the more you will feel His Mercy in your life. You’ll find that your trials and difficulties become easier to handle. You understand His Plan. He will touch the inner depths of your heart with a profound peace.

Before careful of overspending. We break the bank for things which ultimately displease the Almighty. Don’t give in to the whispering of Satan who says you need to live up to a certain lifestyle & reputation. At the end of the day, you’ll end up the loser.

Learn to appreciate the little things in life. They mean a lot. The Almighty has given us so much, more than we need and we take them for granted. We keep wanting more. Constantly think of how blessed we are and never forget to thank Him.

There's no end to what  we want; better car, a bigger house, a better job, more money. The list is endless. Stop for a moment & think. Do we really need all that? Will they make us happy? Ask the Almighty for what’s best. Trust Him to give you what you need most!

How we comment or react on social media speaks volumes about who we are, how we think and what we stand for. The sad reality is that there are still so many out there who don’t think positively. They think the worst of others and always ready to criticise. Don't be like them.

We often take for granted the people closest to us, especially our parents. May the Almighty always guide us to be respectful and kind to them, no matter what status, position and power we have achieved in life. Remember, how they brought us up when we were young.

When you experience worry or anxiety about anything, know that it’s form Satan. When you fully trust the Almighty with all your affairs, you will let go of such feelings because you know at the end of the day, He only wants what’s best for you.

Don't get tired of doing what’s right. No matter what others are saying, you must stay on track and uphold the truth. Keep believing, keep praying, keep expecting. Keep going. The Almighty is in full control.

It's easy to pretend you care for a cause but in actual fact you’re too busy with your own life. Talk is cheap. Anyone can talk about promoting awareness but are you actually doing something? Donating, giving your time? The Almighty knows what our hearts reveal & conceal.

Those who want to steal your peace will provoke you till they get the reaction they want. Remember, the best reaction in this case is NO reaction. Don’t give them the attention they want. Keep your peace!

My Twitter account has overtaken my FB in its following & activity. In order to benefit from FB, you must like & follow the page with priority. Liking, commenting & sharing each post would ensure you don't miss any posts & would also improve the reach so others can benefit too.

The Almighty has clearly stated that He will not burden us beyond what we can bear. If we’re unable to cope with the trials, it’s because we have weak faith and we’re not fully trusting Him. When this happens bearing patience becomes difficult!

Don't wait to forgive someone till they apologise. You may end up waiting forever. Remember, it’s easy to hold a grudge and it’s easy to lay blame. But by doing so, you’re allowing others to have power over you. For the sake of closure & healing, you should forgive and move on.

When you see the Almighty blessing your friends and neighbours, be happy for them. Each time you see someone else being bestowed with His Blessings, rejoice for them. Remember, if He has done it for them, He will do it for you.

We've all been through rough days, a difficult month or a bad year. But these are often blessings in disguise. Remember, everything the Almighty does is good. We only have to wait patiently, hold our head up and press on. Let life take its course.

What's past is done and gone forever. You can’t go back in time to undo anything. The only thing to do is to go forward, learn from past mistakes and with hindsight, forgive yourself for not knowing better then.

Friday Jumu'ah Lecture delivered in CapeTown today. Here is the video. 
https://t.co/YWtWW331gV
If and when you’re tempted to speak about someone else’s fault, speak of yours first. Whatever fault you’ve identified in a person,  probably goes to show that the fault is also present in yourself!

Almighty. On this blessed day, keep our hearts connected to You. When we’re tempted to sin, let us remember that You’re watching & that the Angels are recording all that we do. Give us the strength to exercise self control & keep us away from the opportunities of sin.

All the prayers you’ve been making, the dreams you’ve been wanting so badly, trust the Almighty because He has got it under control. He is going to ensure that things fall into place. He is going to make things happen that you could never have done on your own.

If you’re constantly edgy, always complaining about the slightest thing, low on tolerance and upset with people around you, be wary. These are signs of weak faith. Patience and tolerance are the hallmarks of a believer.

Life is such that there’ll be happiness and sadness. Keep moving even when things are not going your way, even when you’re hurting; because you’ll never know what is waiting for you round the corner. The Almighty works His miracles in the most unexpected ways!

It's important to know when to let go. Sometimes things, situations or people don’t serve any meaningful purpose anymore. It’s the Almighty’s way of telling you it’s time for the next phase. Read the signs and move on.

Remember, when the sun is out, many will claim to be your friend and want to be a part of your life. But the minute thunderstorms occur, check out who actually remains by your side. There won’t be many but they are your true friends.

You've been spending hours in worship and no matter how much you’ve been asking, there seems to be no response. Don’t get frustrated or impatient. The wait, the pain and the struggle will be worth it when the Almighty grants you ease. It will come.

Don't dismiss those with special needs as worthless. The Almighty made them that way for a reason. They’re just different. It doesn’t mean they are worthless. Be kind to them. Help them. Go out of your way to appreciate them. Make them feel special.

It's easy to keep hanging on to the past and feel self pity for what has happened. That’s a waste of time and energy. Start moving forward. Leave the baggage behind. Believe in yourself and trust the Almighty to make things happen.

We are all facing some kind of difficulties. But stand firm in faith, knowing that the Almighty will turn things around. Perhaps not today or tomorrow but it will happen. Your trial won’t last. It will come to pass.

Most people will have an agenda. They can’t bear the thought of you doing well. But don’t forget, they don’t know what the Almighty knows. He knows what you’re capable of. He knows your potential. Don’t let others tell you otherwise.

Don't let negative thoughts breed in your mind. Often we think of ‘what ifs’ and scenarios and worry ourselves for no apparent reason. That’s exactly what Satan wants. Learn to have faith and trust the Almighty instead.

Life’s too short to waste valuable time with the wrong company. Surround yourself with those who will draw you closer to the Almighty. Those who will challenge you to greater heights and to be better human beings.

Be careful what you take away from social media. Depending on your outlook and attitude, you may end up with a ridiculous, fictitious life that so many people end up living. May the Almighty grant us an awareness and protect us all.

When you strive to worship your Maker, late in the night as the rest of the world sleeps,
When you give generously even though you don't have much,
When you worship Him promptly even though you have a busy schedule, it shows you're truly loved by the Almighty.

Don't let people make you feel bad for not conforming to their way of life and habits. You’re answerable to the Almighty for all your actions. You don’t have time to accommodate other people’s demands.

Almighty. On this blessed Friday, purify our hearts of any resentment towards others. Help us to always be aware and conscious of You and to realise that our life is temporary and short. Help us appreciate the value of time and to be aware of how precious and fleeting it is!

No matter how difficult your life has been all this while, know that the Almighty has things planned for you. With Him on your side, you should move forward with confidence. Your best days are out there waiting for you!

Satan will always distract us during  worship. He whispers into our hearts, plays with our minds and makes us recall things which we never thought of before that. Understand his plot when you find your mind straying.

As life gets more hectic & stressful, people have less time for each other. That’s the sad reality. But how often has the Almighty reminded us that He is near. Never think you’re alone. You’re not.  Turn to Him for anything and everything.

Keep your relationship with your Maker private. There’s no need to show off to others how pious you are. Nobody knows your struggle but Him. Nobody knows the temptations that come your way but Him. So keep striving. Keep going.

When your heart is filled with patience, no matter what the Almighty tests you with, the reward is beyond your imagination. The reward for your endurance, for accepting the outcome, no matter what He has chosen for you and the reward for having faith!

When people misunderstand and reject you, don’t feel miserable and depressed. It’s part of the Almighty’s plan to make you realize that you shouldn’t rely on His creation but only on the One who created you.

Don't make the mistake of telling someone too much about yourself. Over sharing is bad. It can invite negative energy and vibes from those who don’t want good for you. Share only with those who have proven they truly care.
